Changelog
=========

1.0.2 (2012-12-22)
------------------

- Quote Portlet: Fail gracefully when there are no quotes.
  [aclark]

1.0.1 (2012-09-08)
------------------

- Forgot `include_package_data` in setup.py for profiles and skins dirs
  [aclark]

1.0.0 (2012-09-08)
------------------

- Initial release
  [aclark]
